message: Let's start fair. I'm giving you a good chunk of the money, Bob.  Hopefully, we can both come out ahead.
I'm willing to split the money more evenly, but I'm taking advantage of the faster inflation rate on your side. Let's make this a fair deal, but one that benefits me a little more.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob.  Let's split the money closer to 55/45, considering the inflation rates.  This way, we both get a decent amount, and we can avoid further losses.
